name: Lupo
description:
LUPO

NO scores! Just FILL the METER to see LUPO DANCE!!!. That's it.

TIPS:

LEFT SHIFT switches the LEFT BALLOoN,  RIGHT SHIFT  switches the RIGHT BALLOON. Having both you can COMBINE them with ENTER.

Change the BALLOONS until it makes the Combination required.

A WRONG combination will make you lose a METER bar.

If the TIMER gets to 0 you lose a METER bar.

A CORRECT combination will reset the TIMER.

Developed solely by Myself (Designer / Programmer / Composer / Artist).
